turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi Alexa, please help me buy a good cup of coffee

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi Veronica, sure. What kind of coffee do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I´m thinking about an iced Café Latte

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, Where do you want me to order it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which one of them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on the Riverside in San Antonio

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. Wich size do you want your Iced Café Latte?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Midzide

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There is Tall and Grande

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, only one cup?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Now you asked... buy 3 please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, wich names should I put on the cups?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Veronica, Mark and Alex

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And all of you are going to have the same tipe of coffe?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Buy 2 Iced Caffé Latte and one Café Mocka

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All with the same sizes?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, the Cafñe Mocka is small

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have short, tall and grande

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Short then

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so I will ask for 2 Iced cafe Latte grande and one short Cafe mocka right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, perfect

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How do you want me to pay for that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Use mi Bank of America Visa

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, tell them that I will pick up the order at 11:00 a.m

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, I will tell them that

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks Alexa

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your are welcome
